front.title: Lab Test Results for Advancing Metrics on the Standards Track

abstract.t: This memo supports the process of progressing performance metric RFCsalong the standards track. Observing that the metric definitionsthemselves should be the primary focus rather than theimplementations of metrics, this memo describes results of examplelab test procedures to evaluate specific metric RFC requirementclauses to determine if the requirement has been implemented asintended. A single implementation has been tested against the keyspecifications of RFC 2679 on One-way Delay.
